name: Bowling (Andromeda Software)
overview: Bowling with a first-person view, the bartender will keep score for you. Game created by Gábor Meresz and released in 1984 by Andromeda Software a British software company that often acted as a middle-hand between programmers in the east bloc and publishers in the West. Perhaps most famous for first introducing Tetris to the western world and eventually selling it to Mirrorsoft and Tengen without a license.
